channel.title: [PI] Donating icons / system
channel.description:
Basically mods and admins both have that old silver crown so the gold admin crown has dissappeared
[center]Basically i want to know how the donating icons work on a PI. When i started the source it was PlayerRights 1 = mod icon [MODICONS 0] PlayerRights 2 = Admin icon [MODICONS 2] PlayerRights 3 = Owner icon[MODICONS 3] PlayerRights 4 = Donator icon icon,[MODICONS 4]
[font=times new roman]So basically i decided i would change the names of the spirites, Eg making MODICONS 0 -- > mod icons 2, So a moderator would be playter rights 2 and so on so a donator would be player rights one.
I have no problem with that but when i switched them around it seems as if its messed up ? IF i make myself player rights one its the correct donator icon but player rights 2 and 3 have the same icon for some reason, both of them get the mod crown however player rights 4 has the owner icon which is correct. i have tried this several times by creating a backup and failed. Looked over LOTS of sites for tutorials camt seem to find one for a PI base, Any help from you guys would be greatly appriceated.
If you want to help me over msn please add yash_runefx@hotmail.co.uk
_________________________________________________________ Please dont say use the search bar ive tried using it on lots of different sites i couldnt find one that worked with PI It might be the wrong section it could have been on posted on 'client help' but i think there are some bits you need to do server sided to make this work.[/center][/font]

item.title: [PI] Donating icons / system
item.dc:creator: @yash yash
item.description:
@yash wrote:

Basically mods and admins both have that old silver crown so the gold admin crown has dissappeared

[center]Basically i want to know how the donating icons work on a PI.
When i started the source it was
PlayerRights 1 = mod icon [MODICONS 0]
PlayerRights 2 = Admin icon [MODICONS 2]
PlayerRights 3 = Owner icon[MODICONS 3]
PlayerRights 4 = Donator icon icon,[MODICONS 4]

[font=times new roman]So basically i decided i would change the names of the spirites, Eg making MODICONS 0 – > mod icons 2, So a moderator would be playter rights 2 and so on so a donator would be player rights one.

I have no problem with that but when i switched them around it seems as if its messed up ?
IF i make myself player rights one its the correct donator icon but player rights 2 and 3 have the same icon for some reason, both of them get the mod crown however player rights 4 has the owner icon which is correct.
i have tried this several times by creating a backup and failed.
Looked over LOTS of sites for tutorials camt seem to find one for a PI base, Any help from you guys would be greatly appriceated.

If you want to help me over msn please add yash_runefx@hotmail.co.uk

Please dont say use the search bar ive tried using it on lots of different sites i couldnt find one that worked with PI
It might be the wrong section it could have been on posted on ‘client help’ but i think there are some bits you need to do server sided to make this work.[/center][/font]

Read full topic
